metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45684 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Northern.tech CFEngine Enterprise before 3.21.3 allows SQL Injection. Thefixed versions are 3.18.6 and 3.21.3. The earliest affected version is3.6.0. The issue is in the Mission Portal login page in the CFEngine hub.

criterions.comment: cfengine3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
